sentences.en: a fortress town enclosed by four miles of ramparts
sentences.cn: 由四英里长的城墙围着的设防城镇

sentences.en: A valiant assault force does not fear a strong fortress.
The easiest way to capture a fortress is from within.
sentences.cn: 堡垒是最容易从内部攻破的.

sentences.en: The fortress is an imposing building.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡是一座宏伟的建筑.

sentences.en: The fortress was highly vulnerable to attacks from the sky.
sentences.cn: 那要塞易于成为空袭的目标,很难防守.

sentences.en: The fortress was proof against the techniques of attack then in use.
sentences.cn: 该防御工事能抵御当时所使用的各种进攻手段。

sentences.en: The soldier scaled the wall of the fortress by turret.
sentences.cn: 士兵通过塔车攀登上了要塞的城墙.

sentences.en: The strong fortress mocked the invaders.
sentences.cn: 坚固的堡垒使入侵者无法攻入.

sentences.en: They made an attempt on a fortress.
sentences.cn: 他们试图夺取这一要塞.

sentences.en: They marched on the enemy's fortress.
sentences.cn: 他们向敌人的要塞进军.

sentences.en: They yield ed the fortress to the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他们把要塞放弃给了敌人.

sentences.en: We captured a fortress of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们占领了敌军的堡垒.

sentences.en: Yield a fortress to the enemy.

trans.tran_en: a large strong building used for defending an important place
